languages.text: "Нет — и к лучшему. Вы знаете..." {n}Идира оглядывается.{/n} "Мне кажется, ксеносы как огня боятся человечьих ведьм. Иначе зачем им держать меня в полубреду и оцепенении? Или делать такие штуки, что режут нашу связь с варпом? О, они боятся! Но знают, как с этим бороться!"

"I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"
languages.original_text: "Нет — и к лучшему. Вы знаете..." {n}Идира оглядывается.{/n} "Мне кажется, ксеносы как огня боятся человечьих ведьм. Иначе зачем им держать меня в полубреду и оцепенении? Или делать такие штуки, что режут нашу связь с варпом? О, они боятся! Но знают, как с этим бороться!"

traits.locale_text: "I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and dazed? Or do things to cut our ties to the warp? Oh, they're so scared! They don't know how else to fight it!"

"I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and dazed? Or do things to cut our ties to the warp? Oh, they're so scared! They don't know how else to fight it!"

"I can't, no—and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and dazed? Or do things to cut our ties to the warp? Oh, they're so scared! They don't know how else to fight it!"

"I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"

"I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"

languages.text: 「できない、無理よ…それにその方がいい。あなたも分かっているでしょう…」{n}イディラは周囲を見渡す。{/n}「異種族は人間の魔女を恐れているんだと思う。そうでなければ、なぜ私を半狂乱にさせたままにしておく必要がある？<歪み>とのつながりを断ち切るため？彼らはすごく恐れている！他に戦う方法がないに違いない！」
languages.original_text: "I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"

traits.locale_text: 「できない、無理よ…それにその方がいい。あなたも分かっているでしょう…」{n}イディラは周囲を見渡す。{/n}「異種族は人間の魔女を恐れているんだと思う。そうでなければ、なぜ私を半狂乱にさせ、朦朧とさせる必要がある？<歪み>とのつながりを断ち切るようなことを？彼らはすごく恐れている！他に戦う方法がないに違いない！」

languages.text: “不，我用不了了。不过这也是件好事，如你所知……”{n}伊迪拉环顾四周。{/n}“我觉得那些异形害怕人类的女巫，不然他们为什么要把我弄得迷迷糊糊的？为什么要这么大费周章，切断我们和亚空间之间的联系？噢，他们已经吓得屁滚尿流了！都不知道该怎么办才好了！”
languages.original_text: "I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"

traits.locale_text: “不，我用不了了。不过这也是件好事，如你所知……”{n}伊迪拉环顾四周。{/n}“我觉得那些异形害怕人类的女巫，不然他们为什么要把我弄得迷迷糊糊的？为什么要想办法切断我们和亚空间之间的联系？噢，他们真的是吓坏了！他们都不知道该如何是好了！”

languages.text: «No puedo, no, y menos mal. Ya sabe...». {n}Idira mira a su alrededor.{/n} «Creo que a los xenos les aterrorizan las brujas humanas. ¿Por qué si no me mantendrían medio delirante y descentrada? ¿Por qué se centrarían tanto en cortar nuestra conexión con la disformidad? ¡Vaya si tienen miedo! ¡Pero no saben de qué otra forma luchar!».
languages.original_text: "I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo, no, y me alegro. ¿Sabe?...». {n}Idira mira a su alrededor.{/n} «Creo que los brujos humanos aterran a los xenos. ¿Por qué, si no, iban a tenerme medio delirante y sedada? ¿O a hacer cosas como cortar nuestra conexión con la disformidad? ¡Oh, nos tienen mucho miedo! ¡No saben cómo enfrentarse a nosotros!».

languages.text: "Ich kann nicht, nein ... und das ist auch gut. Wisst Ihr ..." {n}Idira blickt sich um.{/n} "Ich glaube, die Xenos haben Angst vor menschlichen Hexen. Warum sonst sollten sie mich halb im Delirium halten? Oder all diese Dinge tun, um unsere Verbindung mit dem Warp abzuschneiden? Sie haben einfach nur Angst. Aber sie wissen nicht, wie sie sonst dagegen ankämpfen sollen!"
languages.original_text: "I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann nicht, nein — und das ist auch gut. Wisst Ihr ..." {n}Idira blickt sich um.{/n} "Ich glaube, die Xenos haben fürchterliche Angst vor menschlichen Hexen. Warum sonst sollten sie mich halb im Delirium halten? Benommen? Oder unsere Verbindung zum Warp unterbrechen? Oh, sie haben solche Angst! Sie wissen nicht, wie sie sonst dagegen ankämpfen können!"

languages.text: « Non, je ne peux plus. Et tant mieux. Vous savez... » {n}Elle marque une pause en regardant autour d'elle.{/n} « Les xénos ont une peur bleue des sorcières humaines. Sinon, pourquoi est-ce qu'ils me garderaient comme ça à moitié abrutie ? Ou pourquoi est-ce qu'ils essaieraient de couper nos liens avec le Warp ? Oh, je peux vous le dire, ils sont terrorisés ! C'est le seul moyen qu'ils ont trouvé d'y faire face ! »
languages.original_text: "I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"

traits.locale_text: « Non, je ne peux plus. Et tant mieux. Vous savez... » {n}Elle marque une pause en regardant autour d'elle.{/n} « Les xénos ont une peur bleue des sorcières humaines. Sinon, pourquoi est-ce qu'ils me garderaient comme ça à moitié abrutie ? Ou pourquoi est-ce qu'ils essaieraient de couper nos liens avec le Warp ? Oh, je peux vous le dire, ils sont terrorisés ! C'est le seul moyen qu'ils ont trouvé d'y faire face ! »

languages.text: "Kullanamıyorum, hayır... Hem bu iyi bir şey. Biliyor muydun..." {n}İdira etrafına bakınıyor.{/n} "Sanırım zenolar, cadı insanlardan ölümüne korkuyor. Yoksa niye zorla kısmen hezeyana kapılıp kafayı bulmamı istesinler? Niye öteboyutla olan bağlantımızı koparmak için o kadar uğraşsınlar? Korktukları kesin! Nasıl savaşacaklarını da bilmiyorlar!"
languages.original_text: "I can't, no — and good thing, too. You know..." {n}Idira looks around.{/n} "I think the xenos are terrified of human witches. Why else would they keep me half-delirious and out of it? Or do all those things to sever our connection to the warp? They're scared all right! But they don't know how else to fight it!"

traits.locale_text: "Kullanamıyorum, hayır... Hem bu iyi bir şey. Biliyor muydun..." {n}İdira etrafına bakınıyor.{/n} "Sanırım zenolar, cadı insanlardan ölümüne korkuyor. Yoksa niye zorla kısmen hezeyana kapılıp kafayı bulmamı istesinler? Niye öteboyutla olan bağlantımızı koparmak için o kadar uğraşsınlar? Korktukları kesin! Nasıl savaşacaklarını da bilmiyorlar!"
